idea-plugin.name: Ekam
idea-plugin.description:
Ekam by TestVagrant
Rapid automated tests development library for your Web, Mobile & REST applications.
 Unify all of your test automation under a single repository. Leverage pre-built functions of Ekam solving tech problems, so that you can focus just on authoring only tests. Ekam also simplifies test authoring by means of providing patterns to follow.
